hibernate-mapping.query: select b from com.mg.merp.mfreference.model.Bom b, com.mg.merp.planning.model.GenericItem gi where b.Catalog = gi.Catalog and (b.BomType = com.mg.merp.mfreference.model.BomType.CURRENT or b.BomType = com.mg.merp.mfreference.model.BomType.STANDART) order by gi.LowLevelCode desc

select j from com.mg.merp.manufacture.model.Job j, com.mg.merp.planning.model.GenericItem gi where j.Catalog = gi.Catalog and j.JobStatus = com.mg.merp.manufacture.model.JobStatus.RUNNING order by gi.LowLevelCode desc

select jr.Id, jr.OperNum, jr.Description, jr.CompleteFlag, jr.QtyReceived, jr.QtyComplete, jr.QtyScrapped, jr.QtyMoved, jr.ControlPointFlag from com.mg.merp.manufacture.model.JobRoute jr where jr.Job = :job order by jr.OperNum
select tr, jm.Catalog, jm.Measure from com.mg.merp.manufacture.model.Transaction tr, com.mg.merp.manufacture.model.JobMaterial jm where jm.id = tr.JobRouteResource.Id and tr.Job = :job
